comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: History in the making and here we are almost 100 years later having come almost fully about 180 degrees with the Queen coming and remembering all of the dead.  Well done once again NLI, this is a beauty.  I remember Jervis Street hospital when a lot of it was as it is in this picture.
